prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large prismatic interconnected geometric head with unique merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, hexagonal_lattice patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by shifting and neutral grey inspired by dynamic structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor PABNIXP's profile: 'He who governs', Aethyr BAG, Earth element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'In PABNIXP's presence, things naturally fall into line a calm but firm direction organizes every effort, instilling a sense of duty and responsibility in all.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic interconnected geometric head with unique merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating merkaba, flower_of_life, hexagonal_lattice patterns, styled with Seraph commands influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who governs'
profile_data.essence: In PABNIXP's presence, things naturally fall into line a calm but firm direction organizes every effort, instilling a sense of duty and responsibility in all.
profile_data.angelic_role: Seraph of Terrestrial Order; commands oak-crowned hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic earthen form composed of interconnected octahedral structures, representing the perfect geometric order of Geburah and the structural integrity of earth element. Edges are sharp yet subtly organic, reflecting the balance between rigid discipline and natural growth.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Green symbolizes earth's fertility and growth, bronze represents strength and governance. The shifting pattern mirrors the dynamic yet controlled nature of terrestrial transformation.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing cosmic order, divine structure, and interconnected consciousness
